title: Game Development Consultation
description: Unlock your game's full potential with expert guidance on design, mechanics, and monetization strategies.
long_description: Deep-dive sessions to refine your game's core concepts, optimize player experience, and strategize for market success. Whether you're an indie developer or a studio, I'll help you navigate the complexities of game creation.

title: Community Building Workshop
description: Learn to foster a vibrant and engaged community around your brand or project.
long_description: A hands-on workshop designed to equip you with the tools and knowledge to build, grow, and manage an active online community. Covers everything from initial setup to long-term moderation and event planning.

title: Personal Branding Session
description: Define your unique voice and craft a compelling online presence that resonates with your audience.
long_description: One-on-one sessions focused on developing a strong personal brand. We'll analyze your current presence, identify your core message, and create a roadmap for authentic and impactful communication across all your platforms.

title: Roblox Development Coaching
description: Personalized coaching to enhance your skills in Roblox Studio, from scripting to asset creation.
long_description: Intensive one-on-one coaching for Roblox developers. Whether you're building a new game, optimizing an existing one, or mastering Lua, I provide tailored guidance to accelerate your learning and project success.

title: Esports Team Strategy
description: Develop winning strategies and build a cohesive esports team with expert advice.
long_description: Comprehensive consultation for esports teams and organizations. We'll cover team dynamics, individual player development, competitive meta-analysis, and robust strategies for upcoming tournaments and long-term success.

title: Content Monetization Blueprint
description: Create a sustainable revenue stream from your digital content through strategic planning and implementation.
long_description: A detailed blueprint outlining diverse monetization strategies for your content. From optimizing ad revenue to securing sponsorships and integrating subscription models, I'll help you turn your passion into profit.
